structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.catch_line: Use of funds by county attorney.
law.text: Moneys paid to the county attorney under an agreement entered into pursuant to KRS 134.504 shall be used only for payment of county attorney office operating expenses.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 13, effective January 1, 2010. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 400, sec. 7, effective June 17, 1978.
